80
This building has undergone many changes over the years. Probably originally designed as a summer cottage, it has subsequently been expanded on all sides, all sides. This resulted in a heterogeneous set of multiple additions / expansions
Most of these modifications have been crafted in a very artistic way, and many of them are inconsistent with building standards
According to the additions / enlargements, the shape of the roof (see the comments - roof and roof height) and foundations (see the comments on the basement of the service) have been modified on several occasions
In addition to the vendor owner\'s disclosures regarding multiple water infiltrations through the roof, this building is subject to several defects, some of which may render this building unsuitable for normal use (see comments on the sewer system and the sub-system). - floor of service)"
To make this building suitable for normal use, major and urgent work is needed. We recommend consulting a licensed contractor to evaluate and correct defects. Please note that in view of the complexity and cost of such work, it is likely that an entire reconstruction will be necessary
